word:
Parents, teachers, students, remember that you are building for eternity. See that your foundation is sure; then build firmly, and with 
                                                                           77
persistent effort, but in gentleness, meekness, and love. So shall your house stand unshaken, not only when the storms of temptation come, but when the overwhelming flood of God's wrath shall sweep over the world. Then every house built upon the sand shall fall, and great shall be the fall of it, for the ruin is for eternity.
